	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}
	after = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 1
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
		trigger_event = {
			saved_event_id = scope:next_event
		}
	}
}

LIDAf.3 = {
	# FM_MEETING_WITH_VASSAL: Chains of Command
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.3.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.3.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:partner_stamina
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:study
		}
		random_list = {
			# FM_WHIP_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 3000120
				}
			}
			# FM_FOOTJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 3000220
				}
			}
			# FM_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 3000320
				}
			}
			# FM_PUSSY_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 3000520
				}
			}
			# FM_TIT_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 3000620
				}
			}
			# FM_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 3000420
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# FM_WHIP_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 3000120
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 3000120
				}
			}
			# FM_FOOTJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 3000220
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 3000220
				}
			}
			# FM_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 3000320
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 3000320
				}
			}
			# FM_PUSSY_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 3000520
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 3000520
				}
			}
			# FM_TIT_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 3000620
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 3000620
				}
			}
			# FM_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 3000420
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 3000420
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:first_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = first_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 3000120: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_VASSAL -> EventsSex.FM_WHIP_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.3000120
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 3000120
				scope:first_transition_1 = 3000120
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 3000120
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.1
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 3000220: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_VASSAL -> EventsSex.FM_FOOTJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.3000220
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 3000220
				scope:first_transition_1 = 3000220
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 3000220
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.2
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 3000320: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_VASSAL -> EventsSex.FM_HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.3000320
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 3000320
				scope:first_transition_1 = 3000320
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 3000320
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.3
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 3000520: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_VASSAL -> EventsSex.FM_PUSSY_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.3000520
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 3000520
				scope:first_transition_1 = 3000520
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 3000520
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.5
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 3000620: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_VASSAL -> EventsSex.FM_TIT_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.3000620
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 3000620
				scope:first_transition_1 = 3000620
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 3000620
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.6
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 3000420: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_VASSAL -> EventsSex.FM_ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.3000420
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 3000420
				scope:first_transition_1 = 3000420
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 3000420
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.4
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}
	after = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 3
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
		trigger_event = {
			saved_event_id = scope:next_event
		}
	}
}
LIDAf.4 = {
	# FM_MEETING_WITH_VASSAL_INITIAL: Privileges of Power
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.4.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.4.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:partner_stamina
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:study
		}
		random_list = {
			# FM_WHIP_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 4000120
				}
			}
			# FM_FOOTJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 4000220
				}
			}
			# FM_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 4000320
				}
			}
			# FM_PUSSY_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 4000520
				}
			}
			# FM_TIT_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 4000620
				}
			}
			# FM_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 4000420
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# FM_WHIP_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 4000120
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 4000120
				}
			}
			# FM_FOOTJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 4000220
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 4000220
				}
			}
			# FM_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 4000320
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 4000320
				}
			}
			# FM_PUSSY_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 4000520
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 4000520
				}
			}
			# FM_TIT_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 4000620
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 4000620
				}
			}
			# FM_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 4000420
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 4000420
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:first_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = first_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 4000120: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_VASSAL_INITIAL -> EventsSex.FM_WHIP_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.4000120
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 4000120
				scope:first_transition_1 = 4000120
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 4000120
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.1
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 4000220: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_VASSAL_INITIAL -> EventsSex.FM_FOOTJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.4000220
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 4000220
				scope:first_transition_1 = 4000220
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 4000220
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.2
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 4000320: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_VASSAL_INITIAL -> EventsSex.FM_HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.4000320
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 4000320
				scope:first_transition_1 = 4000320
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 4000320
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.3
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 4000520: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_VASSAL_INITIAL -> EventsSex.FM_PUSSY_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.4000520
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 4000520
				scope:first_transition_1 = 4000520
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 4000520
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.5
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 4000620: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_VASSAL_INITIAL -> EventsSex.FM_TIT_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.4000620
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 4000620
				scope:first_transition_1 = 4000620
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 4000620
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.6
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 4000420: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_VASSAL_INITIAL -> EventsSex.FM_ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.4000420
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 4000420
				scope:first_transition_1 = 4000420
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 4000420
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.4
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}
	after = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 4
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
		trigger_event = {
			saved_event_id = scope:next_event
		}
	}
}
LIDAf.5 = {
	# FM_MEETING_WITH_LIEGE: Mead in my Room?
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.5.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.5.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:partner_stamina
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:bedchamber
		}
		random_list = {
			# FM_WHIP_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 5000120
				}
			}
			# FM_FOOTJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 5000220
				}
			}
			# FM_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 5000320
				}
			}
			# FM_PUSSY_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 5000520
				}
			}
			# FM_TIT_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 5000620
				}
			}
			# FM_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 5000420
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# FM_WHIP_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 5000120
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 5000120
				}
			}
			# FM_FOOTJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 5000220
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 5000220
				}
			}
			# FM_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 5000320
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 5000320
				}
			}
			# FM_PUSSY_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 5000520
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 5000520
				}
			}
			# FM_TIT_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 5000620
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 5000620
				}
			}
			# FM_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 5000420
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 5000420
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:first_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = first_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 5000120: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_LIEGE -> EventsSex.FM_WHIP_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.5000120
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 5000120
				scope:first_transition_1 = 5000120
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 5000120
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.1
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 5000220: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_LIEGE -> EventsSex.FM_FOOTJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.5000220
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 5000220
				scope:first_transition_1 = 5000220
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 5000220
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.2
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 5000320: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_LIEGE -> EventsSex.FM_HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.5000320
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 5000320
				scope:first_transition_1 = 5000320
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 5000320
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.3
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 5000520: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_LIEGE -> EventsSex.FM_PUSSY_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.5000520
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 5000520
				scope:first_transition_1 = 5000520
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 5000520
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.5
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 5000620: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_LIEGE -> EventsSex.FM_TIT_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.5000620
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 5000620
				scope:first_transition_1 = 5000620
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 5000620
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.6
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 5000420: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_LIEGE -> EventsSex.FM_ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.5000420
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 5000420
				scope:first_transition_1 = 5000420
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 5000420
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.4
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}
	after = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 5
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
		trigger_event = {
			saved_event_id = scope:next_event
		}
	}
}
LIDAf.6 = {
	# FM_MEETING_WITH_LIEGE_INITIAL: An Intimate Discussion
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.6.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = throne_room_bow_1
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.6.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:partner_stamina
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:council_chamber
		}
		random_list = {
			# FM_WHIP_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 6000120
				}
			}
			# FM_FOOTJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 6000220
				}
			}
			# FM_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 6000320
				}
			}
			# FM_PUSSY_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 6000520
				}
			}
			# FM_TIT_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 6000620
				}
			}
			# FM_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 6000420
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# FM_WHIP_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 6000120
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 6000120
				}
			}
			# FM_FOOTJOB_TEASE
			10 = {

					scope:finisher_stamina > 0

					}

					name = first_transition_1
					value = 6000220

			# FM_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {

					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 6000320
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 6000320
				}
			}
			# FM_PUSSY_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 6000520
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 6000520
				}
			}
			# FM_TIT_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 6000620
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 6000620
				}
			}
			# FM_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 6000420
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 6000420
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:first_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = first_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 6000120: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_LIEGE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.FM_WHIP_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.6000120
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 6000120
				scope:first_transition_1 = 6000120
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 6000120
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.1
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 6000220: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_LIEGE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.FM_FOOTJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.6000220
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 6000220
				scope:first_transition_1 = 6000220
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 6000220
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.2
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 6000320: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_LIEGE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.FM_HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.6000320
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 6000320
				scope:first_transition_1 = 6000320
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 6000320
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.3
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 6000520: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_LIEGE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.FM_PUSSY_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.6000520
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 6000520
				scope:first_transition_1 = 6000520
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 6000520
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.5
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 6000620: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_LIEGE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.FM_TIT_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.6000620
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 6000620
				scope:first_transition_1 = 6000620
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 6000620
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.6
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 6000420: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_LIEGE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.FM_ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.6000420
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 6000420
				scope:first_transition_1 = 6000420
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 6000420
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.4
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}

		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 6
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
		trigger_event = {
			saved_event_id = scope:next_event
		}
	}

LIDAf.7 = {
	# FM_MEETING_WITH_PRISONER: Taste of Heaven in Hell
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.7.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = prisonhouse
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.7.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:partner_stamina
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:dungeon
		}
		random_list = {
			# FM_WHIP_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 7000120
				}
			}
			# FM_FOOTJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 7000220
				}
			}
			# FM_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 7000320
				}
			}
			# FM_PUSSY_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 7000520
				}
			}
			# FM_TIT_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 7000620
				}
			}
			# FM_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 7000420
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# FM_WHIP_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 7000120
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 7000120
				}
			}
			# FM_FOOTJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 7000220
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 7000220
				}
			}
			# FM_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 7000320
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 7000320
				}
			}
			# FM_PUSSY_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 7000520
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 7000520
				}
			}
			# FM_TIT_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 7000620
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 7000620
				}
			}
			# FM_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 7000420
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 7000420
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:first_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = first_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 7000120: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_PRISONER -> EventsSex.FM_WHIP_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.7000120
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 7000120
				scope:first_transition_1 = 7000120
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 7000120
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.1
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 7000220: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_PRISONER -> EventsSex.FM_FOOTJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.7000220
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 7000220
				scope:first_transition_1 = 7000220
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 7000220
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.2
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 7000320: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_PRISONER -> EventsSex.FM_HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.7000320
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 7000320
				scope:first_transition_1 = 7000320
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 7000320
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.3
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 7000520: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_PRISONER -> EventsSex.FM_PUSSY_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.7000520
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 7000520
				scope:first_transition_1 = 7000520
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 7000520
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.5
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 7000620: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_PRISONER -> EventsSex.FM_TIT_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.7000620
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 7000620
				scope:first_transition_1 = 7000620
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 7000620
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.6
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 7000420: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_PRISONER -> EventsSex.FM_ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.7000420
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 7000420
				scope:first_transition_1 = 7000420
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 7000420
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.4
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}
	after = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 7
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
		trigger_event = {
			saved_event_id = scope:next_event
		}
	}
}
LIDAf.8 = {
	# FM_MEETING_WITH_PRISONER_INITIAL: The Sweetest Torture
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.8.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = prisonhouse
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.8.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:partner_stamina
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:dungeon
		}
		random_list = {
			# FM_WHIP_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 8000120
				}
			}
			# FM_FOOTJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 8000220
				}
			}
			# FM_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 8000320
				}
			}
			# FM_PUSSY_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 8000520
				}
			}
			# FM_TIT_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 8000620
				}
			}
			# FM_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 8000420
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# FM_WHIP_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 8000120
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 8000120
				}
			}
			# FM_FOOTJOB_TEASE
			10 = {

					scope:finisher_stamina > 0

						scope:first_transition_0 = 8000220
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 8000220
				}
			}
			# FM_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 8000320
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 8000320
				}
			}
			# FM_PUSSY_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 8000520
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 8000520
				}
			}
			# FM_TIT_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0

						scope:first_transition_0 = 8000620
					}

				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 8000620
				}
			}
			# FM_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {

					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 8000420
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:first_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = first_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 8000120: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_PRISONER_INITIAL -> EventsSex.FM_WHIP_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.8000120
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 8000120
				scope:first_transition_1 = 8000120
			}
		}

			name = sex_transition
			value = 8000120
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.1
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 8000220: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_PRISONER_INITIAL -> EventsSex.FM_FOOTJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.8000220
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 8000220
				scope:first_transition_1 = 8000220
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 8000220
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.2
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 8000320: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_PRISONER_INITIAL -> EventsSex.FM_HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.8000320
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 8000320
				scope:first_transition_1 = 8000320
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 8000320
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.3
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 8000520: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_PRISONER_INITIAL -> EventsSex.FM_PUSSY_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.8000520
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 8000520
				scope:first_transition_1 = 8000520

			name = sex_transition
			value = 8000520

			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.5
		}

			value = 8000620

			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.6
		}

	option = {

			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 8000420

		}

			name = sex_transition
			value = 8000420
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.4
		}

		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}

			name = prev_event
			value = 8
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
		trigger_event = {
			saved_event_id = scope:next_event
		}

LIDAf.9 = {
	# FM_MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE: Who Owns Who
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.9.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.9.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:partner_stamina
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:sitting_room
		}
		random_list = {
			# FM_WHIP_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 9000120
				}
			}
			# FM_FOOTJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 9000220
				}
			}
			# FM_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 9000320
				}
			}
			# FM_PUSSY_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 9000520
				}
			}
			# FM_TIT_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 9000620
				}
			}
			# FM_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 9000420
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# FM_WHIP_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 9000120
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 9000120
				}
			}
			# FM_FOOTJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 9000220
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 9000220
				}
			}
			# FM_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 9000320
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 9000320
				}
			}
			# FM_PUSSY_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 9000520
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 9000520
				}
			}
			# FM_TIT_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 9000620
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 9000620
				}
			}
			# FM_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 9000420
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 9000420
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:first_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = first_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 9000120: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE -> EventsSex.FM_WHIP_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.9000120
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 9000120
				scope:first_transition_1 = 9000120
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 9000120
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.1
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 9000220: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE -> EventsSex.FM_FOOTJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.9000220
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 9000220
				scope:first_transition_1 = 9000220
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 9000220
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.2
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 9000320: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE -> EventsSex.FM_HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.9000320
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 9000320
				scope:first_transition_1 = 9000320
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 9000320
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.3
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 9000520: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE -> EventsSex.FM_PUSSY_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.9000520
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 9000520
				scope:first_transition_1 = 9000520
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 9000520
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.5
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 9000620: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE -> EventsSex.FM_TIT_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.9000620
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 9000620
				scope:first_transition_1 = 9000620
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 9000620
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.6
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 9000420: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE -> EventsSex.FM_ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.9000420
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 9000420
				scope:first_transition_1 = 9000420
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 9000420
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.4
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}
	after = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 9
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
		trigger_event = {
			saved_event_id = scope:next_event
		}
	}
}
LIDAf.10 = {
	# FM_MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE_INITIAL: A Chance Encounter
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.10.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.10.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:partner_stamina
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:courtyard
		}
		random_list = {
			# FM_WHIP_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 10000120
				}
			}
			# FM_FOOTJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 10000220
				}
			}
			# FM_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 10000320
				}
			}
			# FM_PUSSY_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 10000520
				}
			}
			# FM_TIT_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 10000620
				}
			}
			# FM_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 10000420
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# FM_WHIP_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 10000120
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 10000120
				}
			}
			# FM_FOOTJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 10000220
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 10000220
				}
			}
			# FM_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 10000320
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 10000320
				}
			}
			# FM_PUSSY_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 10000520
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 10000520
				}
			}
			# FM_TIT_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 10000620
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 10000620
				}
			}
			# FM_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 10000420
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 10000420
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:first_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = first_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 10000120: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.FM_WHIP_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.10000120
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 10000120
				scope:first_transition_1 = 10000120
			}
		}

			name = sex_transition
			value = 10000120
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.1
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 10000220: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.FM_FOOTJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.10000220
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 10000220
				scope:first_transition_1 = 10000220

			name = sex_transition
			value = 10000220
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.2
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 10000320: EventsFirst.FM_MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.FM_HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.10000320
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 10000320
				scope:first_transition_1 = 10000320

			name = next_event

		}

			target = scope:affairs_partner

			name = prev_event
			value = 10
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
		trigger_event = {
			saved_event_id = scope:next_event
		}
	}

LIDAf.11 = {
	# MF_MEETING_WITH_SPOUSE: Spicing it Up
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.11.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.11.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:root_stamina
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:bedchamber
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_WHIP_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 11001920
				}
			}
			# MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 11002020
				}
			}
			# MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 11002120
				}
			}
			# MF_DICK_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 11002320
				}
			}
			# MF_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 11002220
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_WHIP_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 11001920
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 11001920
				}
			}
			# MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 11002020
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 11002020
				}
			}
			# MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 11002120
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 11002120
				}
			}
			# MF_DICK_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 11002320
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 11002320
				}
			}
			# MF_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 11002220
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 11002220
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:first_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = first_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 11001920: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_SPOUSE -> EventsSex.MF_WHIP_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.11001920
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 11001920
				scope:first_transition_1 = 11001920
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 11001920
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.19
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 11002020: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_SPOUSE -> EventsSex.MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.11002020
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 11002020
				scope:first_transition_1 = 11002020
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 11002020
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.20
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 11002120: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_SPOUSE -> EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.11002120
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 11002120
				scope:first_transition_1 = 11002120
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 11002120
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.21
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 11002320: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_SPOUSE -> EventsSex.MF_DICK_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.11002320
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 11002320
				scope:first_transition_1 = 11002320
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 11002320
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.23
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 11002220: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_SPOUSE -> EventsSex.MF_ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.11002220
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 11002220
				scope:first_transition_1 = 11002220
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 11002220
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.22
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}
	after = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 11
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
		trigger_event = {
			saved_event_id = scope:next_event
		}
	}
}
LIDAf.12 = {
	# MF_MEETING_WITH_SPOUSE_INITIAL: Flowers in Bloom
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.12.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.12.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:root_stamina
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:garden
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_WHIP_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 12001920
				}
			}
			# MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 12002020
				}
			}
			# MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 12002120
				}
			}
			# MF_DICK_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 12002320
				}
			}
			# MF_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 12002220
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_WHIP_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 12001920
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 12001920
				}
			}
			# MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 12002020
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 12002020
				}
			}
			# MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 12002120
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 12002120
				}
			}
			# MF_DICK_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 12002320
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 12002320
				}
			}
			# MF_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 12002220
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 12002220
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:first_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = first_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 12001920: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_SPOUSE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_WHIP_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.12001920
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 12001920
				scope:first_transition_1 = 12001920
			}
		}

			name = sex_transition
			value = 12001920
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.19
		}
	}
	option = {

		}

		name = LIDAoption.12002320

				scope:first_transition_0 = 12002320
				scope:first_transition_1 = 12002320

			value = 12002320
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.23
		}

		name = LIDAoption.12002220
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 12002220
				scope:first_transition_1 = 12002220

			value = 12002220
		}

		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip

			target = scope:affairs_partner

			name = prev_event
			value = 12
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
		trigger_event = {
			saved_event_id = scope:next_event
		}
