LIDAf.13 = {
	# MF_MEETING_WITH_VASSAL: Chains of Command
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.13.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.13.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:root_stamina
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:study
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_WHIP_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 13001920
				}
			}
			# MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 13002020
				}
			}
			# MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 13002120
				}
			}
			# MF_DICK_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 13002320
				}
			}
			# MF_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 13002220
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_WHIP_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 13001920
					}

				}
			}

				name = first_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}

	option = {
		# 13001920: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_VASSAL -> EventsSex.MF_WHIP_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.13001920
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 13001920
				scope:first_transition_1 = 13001920
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 13001920
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.19
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 13002020: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_VASSAL -> EventsSex.MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.13002020
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 13002020
				scope:first_transition_1 = 13002020
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 13002020
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.20
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 13002120: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_VASSAL -> EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.13002120
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 13002120
				scope:first_transition_1 = 13002120
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 13002120
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.21
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 13002320: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_VASSAL -> EventsSex.MF_DICK_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.13002320
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 13002320
				scope:first_transition_1 = 13002320
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 13002320
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.23
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 13002220: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_VASSAL -> EventsSex.MF_ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.13002220
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 13002220
				scope:first_transition_1 = 13002220
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 13002220
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.22
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}
	after = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 13
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
		trigger_event = {
			saved_event_id = scope:next_event
		}
	}
}
LIDAf.14 = {
	# MF_MEETING_WITH_VASSAL_INITIAL: Privileges of Power
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.14.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.14.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:root_stamina
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:study
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_WHIP_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 14001920
				}
			}
			# MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 14002020
				}
			}
			# MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 14002120
				}
			}
			# MF_DICK_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 14002320
				}
			}
			# MF_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 14002220
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_WHIP_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 14001920
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 14001920
				}
			}
			# MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 14002020
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 14002020
				}
			}
			# MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 14002120
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 14002120
				}
			}
			# MF_DICK_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 14002320
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 14002320
				}
			}
			# MF_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 14002220
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 14002220
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:first_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = first_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 14001920: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_VASSAL_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_WHIP_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.14001920
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 14001920
				scope:first_transition_1 = 14001920
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 14001920
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.19
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 14002020: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_VASSAL_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.14002020
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 14002020
				scope:first_transition_1 = 14002020
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 14002020
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.20
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 14002120: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_VASSAL_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.14002120
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 14002120
				scope:first_transition_1 = 14002120
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 14002120
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.21
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 14002320: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_VASSAL_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_DICK_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.14002320
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 14002320
				scope:first_transition_1 = 14002320
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 14002320
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.23
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 14002220: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_VASSAL_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.14002220
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 14002220
				scope:first_transition_1 = 14002220
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 14002220
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.22
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}
	after = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 14
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
		trigger_event = {
			saved_event_id = scope:next_event
		}
	}
}
LIDAf.15 = {
	# MF_MEETING_WITH_LIEGE: Mead in my Room?
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.15.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.15.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:root_stamina
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:bedchamber
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_WHIP_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 15001920
				}
			}
			# MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 15002020
				}
			}
			# MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 15002120
				}
			}
			# MF_DICK_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 15002320
				}
			}
			# MF_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 15002220
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_WHIP_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 15001920
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 15001920
				}
			}
			# MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 15002020
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 15002020
				}
			}
			# MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 15002120
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 15002120
				}
			}
			# MF_DICK_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 15002320
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 15002320
				}
			}
			# MF_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 15002220
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 15002220
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:first_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = first_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 15001920: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_LIEGE -> EventsSex.MF_WHIP_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.15001920
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 15001920
				scope:first_transition_1 = 15001920
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 15001920
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.19
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 15002020: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_LIEGE -> EventsSex.MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.15002020
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 15002020
				scope:first_transition_1 = 15002020
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 15002020
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.20
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 15002120: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_LIEGE -> EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.15002120
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 15002120
				scope:first_transition_1 = 15002120
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 15002120
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.21
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 15002320: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_LIEGE -> EventsSex.MF_DICK_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.15002320
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 15002320
				scope:first_transition_1 = 15002320
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 15002320
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.23
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 15002220: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_LIEGE -> EventsSex.MF_ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.15002220
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 15002220
				scope:first_transition_1 = 15002220
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 15002220
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.22
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}
	after = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 15
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
		trigger_event = {
			saved_event_id = scope:next_event
		}
	}
}
LIDAf.16 = {
	# MF_MEETING_WITH_LIEGE_INITIAL: An Intimate Discussion
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.16.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = throne_room_bow_1
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.16.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:root_stamina
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:council_chamber
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_WHIP_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 16001920
				}
			}
			# MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 16002020
				}
			}
			# MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 16002120
				}
			}
			# MF_DICK_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 16002320
				}
			}
			# MF_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 16002220
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_WHIP_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 16001920
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 16001920
				}
			}
			# MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 16002020
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 16002020
				}
			}
			# MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 16002120
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 16002120
				}
			}
			# MF_DICK_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 16002320
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 16002320
				}
			}
			# MF_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 16002220
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 16002220
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:first_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = first_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 16001920: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_LIEGE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_WHIP_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.16001920
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 16001920
				scope:first_transition_1 = 16001920
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 16001920
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.19
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 16002020: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_LIEGE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.16002020
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 16002020
				scope:first_transition_1 = 16002020
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 16002020
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.20
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 16002120: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_LIEGE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.16002120
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 16002120
				scope:first_transition_1 = 16002120
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 16002120
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.21
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 16002320: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_LIEGE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_DICK_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.16002320
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 16002320
				scope:first_transition_1 = 16002320
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 16002320
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.23
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 16002220: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_LIEGE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.16002220
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 16002220
				scope:first_transition_1 = 16002220
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 16002220
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.22
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}
	after = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 16
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
		trigger_event = {
			saved_event_id = scope:next_event
		}
	}
}
LIDAf.17 = {
	# MF_MEETING_WITH_PRISONER: Taste of Heaven in Hell
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.17.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = prisonhouse
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.17.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:root_stamina
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:dungeon
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_WHIP_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 17001920
				}
			}
			# MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 17002020
				}
			}
			# MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 17002120
				}
			}
			# MF_DICK_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 17002320
				}
			}
			# MF_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 17002220
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_WHIP_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 17001920
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 17001920
				}
			}
			# MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 17002020
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 17002020
				}
			}
			# MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 17002120
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 17002120
				}
			}
			# MF_DICK_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 17002320
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 17002320
				}
			}
			# MF_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 17002220
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 17002220
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:first_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = first_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 17001920: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_PRISONER -> EventsSex.MF_WHIP_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.17001920
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 17001920
				scope:first_transition_1 = 17001920
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 17001920
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.19
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 17002020: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_PRISONER -> EventsSex.MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.17002020
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 17002020
				scope:first_transition_1 = 17002020
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 17002020
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.20
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 17002120: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_PRISONER -> EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.17002120
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 17002120
				scope:first_transition_1 = 17002120
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 17002120
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.21
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 17002320: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_PRISONER -> EventsSex.MF_DICK_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.17002320
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 17002320
				scope:first_transition_1 = 17002320
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 17002320
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.23
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 17002220: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_PRISONER -> EventsSex.MF_ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.17002220
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 17002220
				scope:first_transition_1 = 17002220
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 17002220
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.22
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}

		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 17
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
		trigger_event = {
			saved_event_id = scope:next_event
		}
	}
}
LIDAf.18 = {
	# MF_MEETING_WITH_PRISONER_INITIAL: The Sweetest Torture
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.18.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = prisonhouse
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.18.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:root_stamina
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:dungeon
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_WHIP_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 18001920
				}
			}
			# MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 18002020
				}
			}
			# MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 18002120
				}
			}
			# MF_DICK_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 18002320
				}
			}
			# MF_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 18002220
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_WHIP_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 18001920
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 18001920
				}
			}
			# MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 18002020
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 18002020
				}
			}
			# MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 18002120
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 18002120
				}
			}
			# MF_DICK_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 18002320
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 18002320
				}
			}
			# MF_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 18002220
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 18002220
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:first_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = first_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 18001920: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_PRISONER_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_WHIP_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.18001920
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 18001920
				scope:first_transition_1 = 18001920
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 18001920
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.19
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 18002020: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_PRISONER_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.18002020
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 18002020
				scope:first_transition_1 = 18002020
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 18002020
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.20
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 18002120: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_PRISONER_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.18002120
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 18002120
				scope:first_transition_1 = 18002120
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 18002120
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.21
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 18002320: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_PRISONER_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_DICK_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.18002320
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 18002320
				scope:first_transition_1 = 18002320
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 18002320
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.23
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 18002220: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_PRISONER_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.18002220
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 18002220
				scope:first_transition_1 = 18002220
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 18002220
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.22
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}
	after = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 18
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
		trigger_event = {
			saved_event_id = scope:next_event
		}
	}
}
LIDAf.19 = {
	# MF_MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE: Who Owns Who
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.19.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.19.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:root_stamina
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:sitting_room
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_WHIP_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 19001920
				}
			}
			# MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 19002020
				}
			}
			# MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 19002120
				}
			}
			# MF_DICK_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 19002320
				}
			}
			# MF_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 19002220
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_WHIP_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 19001920
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 19001920
				}
			}
			# MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 19002020
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 19002020
				}
			}
			# MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {

					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 19002120
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 19002120
				}
			}
			# MF_DICK_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 19002320
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 19002320
				}
			}
			# MF_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 19002220
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 19002220
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:first_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = first_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 19001920: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE -> EventsSex.MF_WHIP_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.19001920
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 19001920
				scope:first_transition_1 = 19001920
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 19001920
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.19
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 19002020: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE -> EventsSex.MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.19002020

			value = 19002020
		}

			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.20
		}
	}

		name = LIDAoption.19002120

			value = 19002120
		}

			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.21
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 19002320: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE -> EventsSex.MF_DICK_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.19002320
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 19002320
				scope:first_transition_1 = 19002320
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 19002320
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.23
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 19002220: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE -> EventsSex.MF_ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.19002220
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 19002220
				scope:first_transition_1 = 19002220
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 19002220
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.22
		}

		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner

			name = prev_event
			value = 19
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
		trigger_event = {
			saved_event_id = scope:next_event
		}
	}

LIDAf.20 = {
	# MF_MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE_INITIAL: A Chance Encounter
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.20.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.20.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = finisher_stamina
			value = scope:root_stamina
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:courtyard
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_WHIP_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 20001920
				}
			}
			# MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 20002020
				}
			}
			# MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 20002120
				}
			}
			# MF_DICK_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 20002320
				}
			}
			# MF_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 20002220
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# MF_WHIP_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:finisher_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 20001920
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 20001920

					}

					name = first_transition_1

					}

				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 20002220

			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:first_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = first_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 20001920: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_WHIP_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.20001920
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 20001920
				scope:first_transition_1 = 20001920
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 20001920
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.19
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 20002020: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_FOOTJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.20002020
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 20002020
				scope:first_transition_1 = 20002020
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 20002020
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.20
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 20002120: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.20002120
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 20002120
				scope:first_transition_1 = 20002120
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 20002120
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.21
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 20002320: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_DICK_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.20002320
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 20002320
				scope:first_transition_1 = 20002320
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 20002320
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.23
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 20002220: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.20002220
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 20002220
				scope:first_transition_1 = 20002220
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 20002220
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = next_event
			value = event_id:LIDAs.22
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}
	after = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 20
		}
		reset_stamina_after_cum_effect = yes
		trigger_event = {
			saved_event_id = scope:next_event
		}
	}
}
